title: Mirumo-Sama Ga Miteru
alternative_title: ミルモ様が見てる ; Mirumo-sama ga Miteru ; Mirumo watches over us
status: ミルモ様が見てる ; Mirumo-sama ga Miteru ; Mirumo watches over us
description:
Description :
        Maki, who lives next door, is a messy childhood friend I'm a bit interested in. For some reason, the cat she picked up, Mirumo, started talking only to me, Yuichi Kuchioka! Huh? It's going to help me get closer to Maki?

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: Maki Is Gonna Study
